code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileCreation=_ref=>{let{checkProfile,profileContract,account}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[bio,setBio]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const createProfile=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{setLoading(true);await profileContract.methods.setProfile(username,bio).send({from:account});checkProfile();}catch(error){console.error(error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"create-profile-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create your profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:createProfile,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Username:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true,className:"profile-input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Bio:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:bio,onChange:e=>setBio(e.target.value),className:"profile-input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"profile-submit",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:"Create Profile"})})]})]});};export default ProfileCreation;
